Description: Caster is aware of the presence of all sentient/ thinking beings within 20'.
Caster can pick a point up to 10' away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls).

Casterâ€™s point of hearing may be moved independently up to 100' away (moves at the rate of 10' per round). He must physically be able to go there (e.g., he could not send his point of hearing thourough walls or closed doors).
As Listen I, except the caster sees from the fixed point (it can rotate).
As Long Ear I, except the caster sees from the moving point (it can rotate).
As Listen I, except the range is 100'.
Caster can read the surface thoughts of one target.
As Watch I, except the range is 100'.
As Long Ear I, except the range is 300'.
As Listen I, except the range is 500'.
As Long Eye I, except the range is 300'.
As Watch I, except range is 500'.
As Listen I, except the range is 1 mile/level.
As Watch I, except the range is 1 mile/level.
As Listen, except the range is unlimited (the caster must be able to locate the desired point in terms of direction and distance).
As Listen True, except the caster sees instead of hearing.
